languages.text: "Какая халатность, Урбенд. Сначала покушение, затем таинственная смерть, а вы ни о чем не знаете. Вольный Торговец может справедливо обвинить вас хотя бы в том, что вы допустили убийство дворянина в стенах замка, и даже не заметили этого".

traits.locale_text: "Какая халатность, Урбенд. Сначала покушение, затем таинственная смерть, а вы ни о чем не знаете. Вольный Торговец может справедливо обвинить вас хотя бы в том, что вы допустили убийство дворянина в стенах замка, и даже не заметили этого".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Your negligence is stunning, Urbend. An assassination attempt followed by a mysterious death, and yet, here you are, oblivious to everything. The Rogue Trader can justly accuse you of allowing a noble to be killed in the palace and of failing even to notice it."
languages.original_text: "Какая халатность, Урбенд. Сначала покушение, затем таинственная смерть, а вы ни о чем не знаете. Вольный Торговец может справедливо обвинить вас хотя бы в том, что вы допустили убийство дворянина в стенах замка, и даже не заметили этого".

traits.locale_text: "Such negligence, Urbend Drivestem. First the assassination attempt, then the mysterious death, and yet you are not aware of anything. The Rogue Trader can justly accuse you of allowing a noble to be killed in the palace walls and not even noticing it."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Such negligence, Urbend Drivestem. First the assassination attempt, then the mysterious death, and yet you are not aware of anything. The Rogue Trader can justly accuse you of allowing a noble to be killed in the palace walls and not even noticing it."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Such negligence, Urbend Drivestem. An assassination attempt followed by a mysterious death, and yet, here you are, oblivious to anything. The Rogue Trader can justly accuse you of allowing a noble to be killed in the castle and failing to notice it."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Such negligence, Urbend Drivestem. An assassination attempt followed by a mysterious death, and yet, here you are, oblivious to anything. The Rogue Trader can justly accuse you of allowing a noble to be killed in the castle and failing to notice it."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your negligence is stunning, Urbend. An assassination attempt followed by a mysterious death, and yet, here you are, oblivious to everything. The Rogue Trader can justly accuse you of allowing a noble to be killed in the palace and of failing even to notice it."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your negligence is stunning, Urbend. An assassination attempt followed by a mysterious death, and yet, here you are, oblivious to everything. The Rogue Trader can justly accuse you of allowing a noble to be killed in the palace and of failing even to notice it."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「見事なまでの過失ですね、、アーベント。不可解な死に続いて暗殺未遂が起きているのです。あなたはここにいるというのに、何ひとつ気づかないとは。自由開拓者があなたを糾弾するのは当然です。この宮殿内で貴族の殺人を許したばかりか、事件に気づかなかったのですから」
languages.original_text: "Your negligence is stunning, Urbend. An assassination attempt followed by a mysterious death, and yet, here you are, oblivious to everything. The Rogue Trader can justly accuse you of allowing a noble to be killed in the palace and of failing even to notice it."

traits.locale_text: 「見事なまでの過失ですね、、アーベント。不可解な死に続いて暗殺未遂が起きているのです。あなたはここにいるというのに、何ひとつ気づかないとは。自由開拓者があなたを糾弾するのは当然です。この宮殿内で貴族の殺人を許したばかりか、事件に気づかなかったのですから」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “厄本，你实在是太懈怠了，让我震惊。先是刺杀，紧接着又是一桩诡异的谋杀，可你显然对此一无所知。行商浪人有充分的理由指责你玩忽职守，导致贵族成员在这座宫殿里丧命。”
languages.original_text: "Your negligence is stunning, Urbend. An assassination attempt followed by a mysterious death, and yet, here you are, oblivious to everything. The Rogue Trader can justly accuse you of allowing a noble to be killed in the palace and of failing even to notice it."

traits.locale_text: “你太松懈了，厄本·德莱夫斯塔。先是刺杀，紧接着又是一桩诡异的谋杀，可你显然对此一无所知。行商浪人有充分的理由指责你玩忽职守，导致贵族成员在这座城堡里丧命。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Vous avez fait preuve d'une négligence inacceptable, Urbend. D'abord la tentative d'assassinat, suivi d'un mystérieux décès... Et pourtant, vous êtes là, à jouer les ignorants. Si {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} veut vous accuser d'avoir laissé un noble se faire tuer dans l'enceinte du palais et de ne vous en être même pas rendu compte, {mf|il|elle} est parfaitement dans son droit. »
languages.original_text: "Your negligence is stunning, Urbend. An assassination attempt followed by a mysterious death, and yet, here you are, oblivious to everything. The Rogue Trader can justly accuse you of allowing a noble to be killed in the palace and of failing even to notice it."

traits.locale_text: « Quelle négligence, Urbend Drivestem ! D'abord la tentative d'assassinat, suivi d'un mystérieux décès... Et pourtant, vous êtes là, à jouer les ignorants. Si {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} veut vous accuser d'avoir laissé un noble se faire tuer dans l'enceinte du château et de ne vous en être même pas rendu compte, {mf|il|elle} est parfaitement dans son droit. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Qué descuidado, Urbend. Un intento de asesinato seguido de una muerte misteriosa y mírese, como si nada. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente podría acusarle de permitir la muerte de un noble en el palacio y no darse ni cuenta».
languages.original_text: "Your negligence is stunning, Urbend. An assassination attempt followed by a mysterious death, and yet, here you are, oblivious to everything. The Rogue Trader can justly accuse you of allowing a noble to be killed in the palace and of failing even to notice it."

traits.locale_text: «Qué descuidado, Urbend Drivestem. Un intento de asesinato seguido de una muerte misteriosa y mírese, como si nada. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente podría acusarle de permitir la muerte de un noble en el castillo».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Eure Nachlässigkeit ist atemberaubend, Urbend. Ein Attentatsversuch gefolgt von einem mysteriösen Tod, und Ihr seid völlig ahnungslos. Ihr habt zugelassen, dass ein Adliger im Palast ermordet wird, und habt es nicht bemerkt. Diesen berechtigten Vorwurf kann Euch {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} machen."
languages.original_text: "Your negligence is stunning, Urbend. An assassination attempt followed by a mysterious death, and yet, here you are, oblivious to everything. The Rogue Trader can justly accuse you of allowing a noble to be killed in the palace and of failing even to notice it."

traits.locale_text: "Welch unerhörte Nachlässigkeit, Urbend Drivestem. Ein Attentatsversuch gefolgt von einem mysteriösen Tod, und Ihr seid völlig ahnungslos. Ihr habt zugelassen, dass ein Adliger im Palast ermordet wird, und habt es nicht bemerkt. Diesen berechtigten Vorwurf kann Euch {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} machen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "İhmalkârlığın beni şaşırtıyor Urbend. Önce suikast girişimi, şimdi de tuhaf bir ölüm. Seninse hiçbir şeyden haberin yok. Hür Tacir Hazretleri seni sarayda bir soylunun öldürülmesine müsaade etmekle ve vaziyetin farkında dahi olmamakla suçlarsa haklıdır."
languages.original_text: "Your negligence is stunning, Urbend. An assassination attempt followed by a mysterious death, and yet, here you are, oblivious to everything. The Rogue Trader can justly accuse you of allowing a noble to be killed in the palace and of failing even to notice it."

traits.locale_text: "İhmalkârlığın beni şaşırtıyor Urbend. Önce suikast girişimi, şimdi de tuhaf bir ölüm. Seninse hiçbir şeyden haberin yok, burada duruyorsun. Hür Tacir Hazretleri seni, sarayda bir soylunun öldürülmesine müsaade etmek ve vaziyetin farkında dahi olmamakla suçlarsa haklıdır."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
